name: Universe Dawn
summary:
Welcome to Universe Dawn, an exhilarating 4x strategy game where you can become the ultimate ruler of the cosmos! In this vast and immersive universe, you'll engage in epic battles, forge alliances, and compete for precious resources. Your journey begins with a single fleet, but as you navigate the stars, you'll upgrade your ships, expand your territory, and face off against other ambitious rulers.

Universe Dawn offers a unique blend of strategy and adventure, allowing you to shape your own destiny. Whether you choose to conquer through force or diplomacy, the universe is yours to command. Join the fight, upgrade your fleet, and become the greatest ruler the universe has ever known!
